bibl.seg: TERRAS Melissa M., with a Foreword by Professor Alan K. BOWMAN and Professor Michael BRADY, Image to Interpretation. An Intelligent System to Aid Historians in Reading the Vindolanda Texts. (Oxford Studies in Ancient Documents.)
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2006, 8°, xii-252 pp., 86 figg. ISBN 978-0-19-920455-7. £50.

1. Introduction. - 2. How Do Papyrologists Read Ancient Texts? Knowledge Elicitation and the Papyrologist (1). - 3. The Palaeography of Vindolanda.
